entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 02 January 2023
